tika-s0303t3:2_0: 302-311.Saddhādhimokkhanti saddahanavasena pavattaṁ adhimokkhaṁ, na sanniṭṭhānamattavasena pavattaṁ adhimokkhaṁ.
tika-s0303t3:2_1: Dassanampi sammattaṁ, taṁsijjhānavasena pavattaniyāmo sammattaniyāmo, ariyamaggo.
tika-s0303t3:2_2: Anantarāyataṁ dīpeti kappavināsapaṭibhāgena pavattattā. Tathā cāha ‘‘tenevāhā’’tiādi.
tika-s0303t3:2_4: So hi uḍḍayhati, na kappo, uḍḍayhanavelāti jhāyanavelā.
tika-s0303t3:2_5: Ṭhito kappo ṭhitakappo, so assa atthīti ṭhitakappī, kappaṁ ṭhapetuṁ samatthoti attho.
